input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: RATP. Summary: Adaptation of Line 7 to the Arrival of the Mf19 - Creation of an Amt and an Access Tunnel on the La Courneuve Sitelot Txp_03 - Crossing Structure for the Concessionary Networks. Description: 1.1 Context The arrival of the new MF19 rolling stock requires the creation of a maintenance workshop on the La Courneuve site. This workshop will be dedicated to the maintenance of future trains intended for lines 7 and 10. It will be connected to the existing network of line 7 through a tunnel of approximately 430 meters. The construction of this tunnel involves the prior diversion of several concessionary networks whose route conflicts with that of the tunnel. To allow these diversions and ensure the continuity of networks in their final position, a specific crossing work must be carried out. 1.2 Purpose of the contract This consultation concerns the construction of a crossing structure consisting of a reinforced concrete slab founded on secant piles temporary, will initially serve as support for the networks in the provisional phase, then as a covering slab for the tunnel in the final configuration. Furthermore, the secant piles made for the crossing work will serve as support. waterproof during tunnel earthworks. This contract includes the following technical positions: - Execution studies - Site installation and site confinement - Site development and site protection - Demolition - Removal - Secant piles (approximately 400 ml) - Earthworks (approximately 400 m3) and retaining walls in Berlin (approximately 300m2) - Reinforced concrete structure (approximately 150m3) - Waterproofing (approximately 120 m2) The.... input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: DALKIA MÉDITERRANÉE OR ANY PROJECT COMPANY FORMED BY DALKIA MÉDITERRANÉE. Summary: Framework Agreement for Works Relating to the Heat and Cold and Cooling Network, and Optical Fiber, Vrd, Supply and Installation of Pre-Insulated Tubes for the Dsp of Avignon. Description: Dalkia was awarded a public service delegation contract relating to the financing, design, construction and operation of a hot, cold and cooling network powered by the recovery of calories on the networks sanitation, geothermal wells, a biomass power plant, a hybrid power plant (PAC) and gas boiler rooms. This contract is managed by Dalkia, which is in charge of this DSP and will ultimately supply heating and domestic hot water to subscribers of all types. (housing, culture, teaching, etc.). The network is made up of 3 sub-assembly (including installation of the fiber): heating network with antennas to the substations which serves the city of Avignon with hot water, temperature of the primary fluid at the inlet of the delivery station is 70°C +/- 2°C; 1 cooling network, the temperature of the primary fluid entering the delivery station is 7°C +/- 1°C; 1 cooling network, the temperature of the primary fluid entering the delivery station is 12°C +/- 1°C. Framework agreement for works on the perimeter of the Avignon DSP. Civil engineering works, VRD and installation of heating networks over an estimated length of trench 47,500 ml from DN50 to DN300. This consultation concerns the conclusion of a Framework Agreement Civil engineering works, VRD and installation of networks, multi-awardees in Avignon, executable by the conclusion of subsequent contracts or purchase orders, with a maximum amount of 50,000,000 euros.... Published Date: 2025-12-22. Closing Date: 2026-01-12. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Summary: Works Contract for the Restructuring and Extension of the Technical Platform of the Saint-Omer Regional Hospital Center (Complementary Aoo Lot C and D). Description: This consultation concerns a works contract for the restructuring and extension of the technical platform of the Saint-Omer Regional Hospital Center. This consultation went through an open call for tender procedure, carried out under articles L.2124-2, R.2124-1, R2124-2 1° and R.2161-2 to R.2161-5 of the Public Procurement Code. As part of the previous procedure, lots C and D were declared without further action, in particular due to a poor definition of the need. This framework agreement covers a set of intellectual services linked to the BIM process, applicable to all sites. Faced with technological developments, SIAAP wishes to rely on this contractual support to support its design and construction projects, as well as to ensure optimized management of its assets. It is structured into 3 lots: - The lots (Assistance Project Management (AMO) BIM, Digitization Lot and Modeling Lot) are framework agreements with multi-awarder purchase orders. The distribution of services by lot is as follows: * Project Management Assistance (AMO) BIM Lot Two types of missions are expected: 1- Support the project owner in the management of the project in the design and execution phases, from a BIM angle 2- Support from management for the structuring of documents linked to BIM, outside of specific projects. * Digitization Lot The purpose of this lot is to provide digitalization services, in particular the acquisition of point clouds (aerial, terrestrial, networks), with a view to modeling or analyzing assets. * Modeling batch This batch allows the creation of 3D digital models integrating data from various sources (paper plans, CAD files, point clouds). input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: TOWN OF SAINTE-MAXIME. Summary: Complete Renovation of the Positive Cold Production of the Central Kitchen. Description: The project consists of carrying out a complete renovation of the positive cold production of the municipal central kitchen of Sainte-Maxime. The intervention aims to completely replace the existing installation operating on R448A, which has become obsolete, with one new installation operating with HFO R1234yf fluid, classified A2L, compliant with the future obligations of the F-Gas III regulations. The installation must make it possible to continuously ensure the required temperature levels in the various refrigeration rooms, without significant interruption of activity in the central kitchen. The services will be remunerated by application of the overall fixed price as specified in the breakdown of the overall and fixed price, which will be reported in the act of commitment when of the attribution. Published Date: 2025-12-22. Closing Date: 2026-01-28. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: CITY OF POITIERS. Summary: Project Manager for the Partial Renovation of Ernest Perochon Schools (Nursery and Elementary), City of Poitiers - Bellejouanne District (86). Description: As part of a renewal of the Bellejouanne district, the City of Poitiers is carrying out the project of partial renovation of the Ernest PEROCHON nursery and elementary schools. This contract concerns the project management and OPC missions to carry out this operation. This operation aims in particular at the energy renovation and accessibility of school buildings (buildings A and B). The operation includes the greening of the courtyards, the renovation of the toilets, the creation of a room nursery extracurricular. This one-off extension is inseparable from the existing part of the kindergarten. The amount of the envelope allocated to the work is 2,765,000 euro(s) excluding tax (value June 2025). Published Date: 2025-12-22. Closing Date: 2026-01-29. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Project Manager for the Partial Renovation of Ernest Perochon Schools (Nursery and Elementary), City of Poitiers - Bellejouanne District (86)

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: TOWN OF SEVRAN. Summary: Geotechnical Study Mission for the City. Description: The services provided under this contract aim to carry out soil studies, for new construction work, the extension of existing buildings in the municipal territory of Sevran. These services are carried out in accordance with the standard NF P 94-500 of November 2013 and the decree of July 22, 2020 defining the content of the geotechnical studies to be carried out in areas exposed to the phenomenon of differential ground movement following drought and soil rehydration. The incumbent will therefore be responsible for carrying out studies on the nature of the soil on behalf of the City of Sevran. The description of the expected services, as well as their technical characteristics are indicated in the Technical Clauses Specifications specific (CCTP). Published Date: 2025-12-22. Closing Date: 2026-01-21. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The purpose of this contract is to provide collection and processing services for various waste such as green waste, hazardous household waste, metals and rubble from the Troyes Champagne Métropole agglomeration community as well as the City of Troyes. In accordance with article L2113-10 of the Public Procurement Code, this consultation is allocated as follows: - Lot n°1: Collection and treatment of green waste from the Troyes Champagne Métropole recycling centers, - Lot n°2: Collection and treatment of hazardous household waste from the Troyes Champagne Métropole recycling centers, - Lot n°3 : Collection and processing of rubble from the Troyes Champagne Métropole recycling centers, -Lot n°4: Collection and processing of metals from the Troyes Champagne Métropole recycling centers; -Lot n°5: Collection and treatment of green waste from the commune of Troyes, -Lot n°6: Collection and treatment of hazardous household waste from the municipal waste management platform of the municipality of Troyes, -Lot n°7: Collection and treatment of rubble from the.... input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: ARB NOUVELLE-AQUITAINE. Summary: Study of the Links between Biodiversity and Economic Sectors in New Aquitaine. Description: The aim of this study is to understand the links between the environment and economic activity in the neo-Aquitaine territory. These links are characterized by the dependencies of economic activities on ecosystem services and by the impacts of activities economic on the environment. Understanding these links is environmental economics work. This involves crossing environmental and economic data. Understanding and characterizing these links aims to better protect the elements of the territory (notably environmental and socio-economic) to face the current and future challenges posed by the collapse of biodiversity, ecosystems, environmental pollution (watercourses, groundwater, etc.) and by the climate change.. Published Date: 2025-12-21. Closing Date: 2026-02-16. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: INTERDEPARTMENTAL UNION FOR THE SANITATION OF THE PARIS AGGLOMERATION (SIAAP). Summary: Work to Create an Access Well to the Dplb. Description: Creation of an access shaft to the DPLB (Délestage du Pantin La Briche) as close as possible to the point of impact between the SIAAP structure and the tunnel boring machine of line 15 East of the Grand Paris Express. The DPLB is a unitary collector belonging to the SIAAP and managed by the DEA. This project concerns a portion of the DPLB, between R1 and R2, located at the intersection with the route of line 15 East of the Grand Paris Express. This intersection is located at the intersection of rue de la Maladrerie and rue Léopold Réchossière, on a section between R2+285 and R2+345, i.e. a section of approximately 60 linear meters. This section is located in the immediate vicinity of the point of impact of the tunnel boring machine and therefore constitutes a critical zone requiring secure access, for the purposes of inspections, monitoring and control before, during and after passage of the tunnel boring machine. The portion of the DPLB collector concerned is a reinforced concrete sanitation structure (voussoir type, 22cm thick) with a diameter of 3000 mm built in the 2000s. The well access will be made at the corner of rue Léopold Réchossière and rue de la Maladrerie, on a plot made available to the SGP. The location of the well will be within the area of ​​the future park managed by Plaine Commune. Work to create the well access includes: - soil injection work - earthworks, drying, civil engineering and equipment for the 2m x 2m well (15.50m deep) and its 2m x 1m gallery (10m long) - connection.... Published Date: 2025-12-21. Closing Date: 2026-01-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: The subject of this consultation is the work of lots n° 01 (VRD), n° 02 a and 02 b (a: Special foundations - b: Structural work - initially n° 02 Structural work), n° 04 (Covering - Waterproofing), n° 11 (Painting) and n° 14 (Stainless steel basin) of the market extension and improvement of the Ovive community aquatic center in Ecrouves (54). The project consists of the creation of two extensions to the said complex: - one to the north including the construction of a pool hall, an indoor hall with paddling pool and splashpad (operation no. 1), - the other to the south housing a relaxation area, a hammam, a jacuzzi as well as an outdoor pool (with indoor water launch) with access via the outdoor beach (covered terrace) to a sauna area (two outdoor saunas) (operation no. 2) and an adaptation and improvement of the existing stainless steel interior pool (operation no. 3). The site remains active for the duration of the work (work on an occupied site).. Published Date: 2025-12-21. Closing Date: 2026-01-29. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: SYTRAIVAL operates the Villefranche Sur Saône heat network supplied with heat from the Energy Recovery Unit (UVE) and a wood boiler room. The life of the heating network is in an extension phase and requires work to be carried out. connection of substations and delivery stations. In this context, SYTRAIVAL wishes to select a company to carry out the work. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: GRANDLYON METROPOLE. Summary: Lyon 1 and 2 - Redevelopment of the Quays of the Right Bank of the Rhône - Operational Phase N°1: Wilson Section / Passerelle Du Collège and Voie Lyonnaise 6 in its Entirety. Lot 2 Roads and Div Networks. Description: The project to requalify the right bank of the Rhône concerns the river frontage quays on the right bank of the Rhône from the Pont de Lattre de Tassigny to the Pont Gallieni, including the Pont de la Guillotière. These docks, located in the heart of the sector heritage of Lyon, are currently characterized by the predominance of the car with a quasi-motorway character. In this context, a significant potential of spaces could be freed from the omnipresence of the car and reallocated to new uses in a qualitative public space favorable to active mobility, public transport, economic, fun, recreational, sporting and cultural activities, maintaining a link with the river and offering a generous plant landscape. Considering the perimeter Consequently, this operation will take place over several mandates. These contracts concern the redevelopment of the quays of the Right Bank of the Rhône - Operational phase n°1: Wilson section / Passerelle du Collège and Voie Lyonnaise 6 in its totality. These are the lots: Lot n°2 Road works and various networks Lot n°3 Public lighting works Lot n°4 Tricolor light signaling works Lot n°5 Green space works - furniture - games Lot n°6 Civil engineering, heritage - High platforms Lot n°7 Civil engineering of lower ports and plant engineering. Published Date: 2025-12-21. Closing Date: 2026-03-06. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Lyon 1 and 2 - Redevelopment of the Quays of the Right Bank of the Rhône - Operational Phase N°1: Wilson Section / Passerelle Du Collège and Voie Lyonnaise 6 in its Entirety. Lot 2 Roads and Div Networks
output.Description: The project to requalify the right bank of the Rhône concerns the river frontage quays on the right bank of the Rhône from the Pont de Lattre de Tassigny to the Pont Gallieni, including the Pont de la Guillotière. These docks, located in the heart of the sector heritage of Lyon, are currently characterized by the predominance of the car with a quasi-motorway character. Considering the perimeter Consequently, this operation will take place over several mandates. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: SAGEP. Summary: Mixed Framework Agreement for Project Management for the Development of the Bormettes Site - Municipality of Londe Des Maures (83). Description: The Communauté de communes Méditerranée Porte des Maures entrusted SAGEP with project management, through a mandate, for the construction of the public facilities necessary for the development of the Bormettes site. It is within this framework that SAGEP is launching the this consultation by acting in the name and on behalf of the community, as an agent. The purpose of the framework agreement is to provide project management for the design and construction of public spaces and adjoining infrastructure necessary for the development of the Bormettes site with a view to its development. The detailed content of the services is defined by the documents in the consultation file. This is a single-award, mixed framework agreement composed of a purchase order part and a party to subsequent contracts, with a maximum awarded in application of articles L. 2125-1 1°, R. 2162-1 to R. 2162-12 of the Public Procurement Code. The services which fall under the purchase order part or the subsequent contract part are described by the documents in the consultation file. For the purchase order part: it will result in the issuance of purchase orders as and when necessary. All execution conditions are defined by the framework agreement. For the market part subsequent contracts: It will result in the conclusion of subsequent contracts as and when required. The form of the contracts will be defined by each subsequent contract. The maximum amount of the framework agreement is specified.... Published Date: 2025-12-21. Closing Date: 2026-01-20. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: DUNKIRK HOSPITAL CENTER. Summary: Works Contract for the Restructuring and Extension of the Technical Platform of the Saint-Omer Regional Hospital Center (Complementary Aoo Lot C and D). Description: This consultation concerns a works contract for the restructuring and extension of the technical platform of the Saint-Omer Regional Hospital Center. This consultation went through an open call for tender procedure, carried out under articles L.2124-2, R.2124-1, R2124-2 1° and R.2161-2 to R.2161-5 of the Public Procurement Code. As part of the previous procedure, lots C and D were declared without further action, in particular due to a poor definition of the need. Summary: Road Coating Work Using Cold Cast Bituminous Materials (Mbcf) and Combined Surface Coatings (Rsc) for the Needs of the Department of Oise. Description: The purpose of the consultation is to carry out road surfacing works in cold cast bituminous materials (MBCF) and combined surface coverings (RSC) on the road network of the Department of Oise. It will be executed through the conclusion of subsequent contracts. The sub-criteria retained for the judgment of the offers are defined in the regulations of the consultation. The criteria for awarding subsequent contracts appear in the Specifications of Special Administrative Clauses. During the period of validity of the framework agreement, the markets subsequent contracts are awarded after re-competition between the holders of the lot(s) corresponding to the subject of the subsequent contract. This re-competition occurs when the need arises. Each lot will be awarded separately. THE Details of the missions entrusted to the holder appear in the specifications. The form, as well as the characteristics of the prices of the services will be determined by each subsequent contract. Prices may be modified during each re-competition without however, exceed the maximum rates and amounts appearing in the ceiling price benchmarks. Prices are firm for the first year then revisable annually by renewal period on the anniversary date...

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: PAYS DE LA LOIRE REGION. Summary: Framework Agreement for Project Management Assistance for the Preparation, Award and Monitoring of Operations-Performance Maintenance and Associated Services Contracts (Mempsa) for the Needs of Eps. Description: The Pays de la Loire Region wishes to be fully involved in achieving the objectives of the Tertiary Eco Energy System (DEET) on its real estate assets. Local Public Education Establishments (EPLE) are particularly targeted because they alone represent a very large part of this heritage. These objectives for 2030, 2040 and 2050 involve actions to reduce regular, significant and long-term energy consumption. The operation and maintenance of sites represents thus a consequent and obligatory lever of action for their achievement. The main purpose of this intellectual service framework agreement is: - The carrying out of Project Management Assistance (AMO) missions to support the Region of Pays de la Loire for the definition of the need, the development, the award, the execution and the monitoring of performance operation and maintenance contracts for technical equipment (heating, domestic hot water, ventilation) of public high schools in the Region. Furthermore, this framework agreement for intellectual services has the secondary purpose of: - The provision of services associated with the achievement of the main purpose of the contract. The associated services may concern study and expertise missions, performance monitoring, work supervision, training and all other services related to the smooth running of the operation and maintenance of sites and the improvement of installations. .... Published Date: 2025-12-21. Closing Date: 2026-02-09. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: PETR HEART OF HAUTS DE FRANCE. Summary: Territorial Pacte France Renov' - Component No. 3 Technical, Financial and Administrative Support for Work Projects. Description: This contract concerns component no. 3 "Support" of the Territorial Pact of the PETR Heart of Hauts-de-France. The scope of operation includes two inter-municipalities: - the Haute-Somme Community of Communes (CCHS); - the Community of communes Land of Picardy (TdP). The territory, the subject of the operation, brings together 103 municipalities and has approximately 44,451 inhabitants (INSEE, 2022). The scope could expand to the Community of Communes of the East of the Somme (CCES), bringing together 41 municipalities and counting 19 829 inhabitants. This extension is planned as part of an optional portion of the contract. The service consists of technical, financial and administrative support for home improvement projects for private owners. The number of file to be processed is specified in the CCTP. It also includes participation in steering meetings (COPIL), as well as various technical and information meetings, particularly as part of the communication of the system.. input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: GRAND ANNECY. Summary: Cycle Development Work on Boulevard Du Fier in the Town of Annecy. Description: The Greater Annecy Urban Community has been engaged for several years in a process of developing the use of bicycles as a means of travel within its territory. In line with the Cycle Master Plan, Greater Annecy is redeveloping the northern part of Boulevard du Fier between the intersection with rue du Maréchal Leclerc and the roundabout of avenue de Genève (1006 meters). This project mainly consists of the creation of a unidirectional cycle path in each direction of traffic in order to isolate cycle flows from road flows. The time limit for execution of services is set at 22 weeks from the start-up service order, plus 8 weeks of preparation period from service order no. 1. Published Date: 2025-12-20.
